channel.title: IceBlitz - Good combat, Insane switching, New: Polypore,steadfast & More
channel.description:
[center]Hello,
I am buying the webhost/domain for my server within a week, and I really need a good developer who can also do a bit client sided work for future updates . The server is really stable and the combat system is redone fully . The summoning is not 100% yet, i'm working on that . So Yea if the server is ready to release I'll invest $500 in advertisements to get players . Also have a lot of youtube connections with famous youtubers, which means I'll be getting them to upload my promotional on the 1st day of release which will get the server 50 + already . So yea if anyone wants to help out or join my team then leave a reply or add me on skype, Skype: Rafr200 .[/center]
[center]Base: Soulsplit
Team: Just me atm, really need a developer . So if you wanna get rich and join my team feel free to add me on skype . Skype: Rafr200
Preview: Music system done,Summoning specials done,Quick prayers done, New items added & MORE!
[IMG]http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/4631/image3sd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/4110/image2yf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/9501/image1qu.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: IceBlitz - Good combat, Insane switching, New: Polypore,steadfast & More
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

This is just what my topic was talking about.

[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/4110/image2yf.jpg[/img]

I don’t freaking care about donor shops! If people see your server is good they’ll donate and find it themselves, but DO NOT put it as a feature/picture, it shows that you’re greedy and desperate for donations.

Besides this, it looks decent enough.

EDIT:

Just me atm, really need a developer . So if you wanna get rich and join my team feel free to add me on skype . Skype: Rafr200

Another sign that shows you are greedy for donations.

Do not overestimate your creation to be a sever where 100s will play. Always think of the bare minimum and how you can use that bare minimum to your advantage. A big community has more immaturity and most people sometimes will not follow you. A small community with about 5 - 20 on has a strong brotherhood and actually respect there owner. They actually even know there is an owner and even communicate with the owner.

Think of these aspects when making an rsps, more players means less control, but more chance of donations. However, a lower player base has more brotherhood, respect, and actually KNOW who you are.

When I played RevolutionX back when it started, I actually KNEW the owner. But now, when they switched to the Matrix source, I didn’t know the owner, I didn’t even know if he cared for us players with 0 to no updates, and him barely getting on.

So the basic summary is, do not think of 100s playing in 1 day, think of the bare minimum that you can use to your advantage.

Read full topic
